FuncDef:
The peer-backup batch access enable command enables users to go online during batch backup.
The undo peer-backup batch access enable command disables users from going online during batch backup.
By default, users are disabled from going online during batch backup.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable users to go online during RBS batch backup and allocate the IP address that is not in the IP address pool being back up in batch, run the peer-backup batch access enable command. To disable users from going online during RBS batch backup, run the undo peer-backup batch access enable command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
